channel.title: Telecom on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Telecom on FinanClub

item.title: CSCO
item.description: score:51 Chances: Cisco Systems, Inc. is set to bolster its secure networking capabilities across public clouds with the intent to acquire Isovalent, a leader in open source cloud native networking and security. Cybersecurity companies have seen an explosion in revenue growth, driven by increased demand for cloud-based cybersecurity infrastructure.

item.title: NOK
item.description: score:344 Chances: Nokia’s disinvestment deal to offload its Device Management and Software Management business reflects the company’s strategic focus on key growth areas such as SaaS, 5G core, and Network as a Code. The acquisition of Device Management and Service Management Platform businesses by Lumine Group enhances Nokia’s software portfolio and allows Nokia to focus on investing in other strategic areas.
